releases.highlights: Asset loading visualization. New Factory layout. New power generators

changes.text: Exploration map is isometric again, and follows a different, more balanced generation pattern.
Changed main layout of the Factory tab
Added user audit session information
Unlocking researched recipes will now give additional research points, and also boost overall research production
Added steel forge and heavy assembly plant
Improved picking and dragging of buildings, now if two buildings are beside each other it works much more reliably.

releases.highlights: Asset loading visualization. New Factory layout. New power generators

changes.text: Added loading progress bar to the landing page
Changed main layout of the Factory tab
Added the diesel power plant, the solar array, and the nuclear reactor
Now recipes that require raw materials for the prototype can be unlocked (prototype will automatically receive the raw materials, if extraction nodes exist for it).
Added quick game tutorial, that appears when the user creates a new game
Added a tips mechanism that helps the user dynamically during the game. This will be expanded in subsequent releases
Added a feedback mechanism to allow users to send feedback to the developers
Authentication/first login has been improved. Now it doesn't require admin approval, and a wellcome email is automatically sent to the user.
Added external market dynamics. Improved market price history management.
Added thermal generator, windmill and coal power plant
New UI look&feel, with different colors. Added Game logo.
New research mechanic: Targetted experiment.
Research mechanic: Adjusted the way prototypes are built after the recipe has been unlocked.
Added badge to display pending recipes to unlock in Research tab.
Redesigned ground around factory.
Added fuel requirement to generators, and adjusted generators in general.
Materials will only be consumed once the prototype is built.
